text:
It’s possible you’ll need to upload Octavia Spencer‘s skirt for your vacation buying groceries listing.

The award-winning actress seemed on Jimmy Kimmel Reside! with visitor host Melissa McCarthy, and surprised with a Michel Studio sequined skirt from plus-sized store Addition Elle, who lately has pill collections with Jordyn Woods and Ashley Graham. The A-line, mid-length garment options tulle and gold gildings, leading to a trendy, but glam glance that stole the display.

Pairing with a gold waist belt, sheer best, observation earrings and black high-heel sandals, this metallic-accented ensemble is universally flattering and suitable for any instance this season, together with your administrative center celebration, dinner soiree or seasonal cocktail tournament.

And…you guessed it: It is 50% off. Quite than pay $170 for the glowing skirt, it is marked right down to $85.
